Client now accepts encrypted messages anyway, allowing to keep them until the user decides how to decrypt them

The encrypted message will get stored in Base64, waiting for the user
to decrypt it, whenever the passphrase set is correct.
User can now set passphrase regardless of the Encryption enabled flag.

a manual update.
